Description:
Identifies when a device or device configuration in azure is modified or deleted.

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Azure Device or Configuration Modified or Deleted
Query: sourcetype="azure-activitylogs" (properties.message="Delete device" OR properties.message="Delete device configuration" OR properties.message="Update device" OR properties.message="Update device configuration")
